message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.RO, cs.MM 

Reasoning: 
1. cs.CV (Computer Vision) is the most likely sub-category as the paper deals with predicting optical flow from static images using a convolutional neural network. 
2. cs.LG (Machine Learning) is also likely as the paper uses a deep learning approach to train the model. 
3. cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) is another possible sub-category as the paper deals with predicting future motion based on the context of the scene. 
4. cs.RO (Robotics) is a possible sub-category as predicting motion is important in robotics applications. 
5. cs.MM (Multimedia) is also a possible sub-category as the paper deals with predicting motion in videos.
